lead_paragraph: BEGUN--Martin S. I have a had a long and rewarding career as a physician, author, teacher and researcher, which would not have been possible without the extraordinary help of Marty Begun when he was Dean at NYU School of Medicine. I, and a multitude of others, are eternally grateful to him. He will be missed but never forgotten. Steven R. Goldstein, M.D. Professor of Obstetrics and Gynecology NYU Langone Medical Center 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BEGUN, MARTIN S
